content:
The Main Directorate of Intelligence The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has published a video of destruction in the temporarily occupied Crimea of the Russian patrol ship "Sergey Kotov".

The video was posted in the GUR Telegram.

On footage you can see how Magura V5 sea drones take turnsattack a Russian shipseveral explosions occurred.

According to GUR, the ship was damaged by feed, right and left sides. Fire lesions occurred in the territorial waters of Ukraine, near the Kerch Strait.

The cost of a sinking ship is about $ 65 million.

We will remind, on February 15, a large landing ship of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation "Caesar Kunikov"DestroyedFifth with sea drones during the transition from Novorossiysk to temporarily occupied Sevastopol.

Earlier the ArmyinformvisualizedWhat looks like the marine battle of defense forces for our Black Sea with a hostile fleet.
title: As the "Sergey Kotov" was drowned - GUR showed the destruction of the patrol ship of the Russian Federation
description: The video was posted in the GUR Telegram. On the footage you can see how sea drones ...
author: Army Inform
